No. 09-976. No. 09-977. No. 09-978. No. 09-979. No. 09-980. No. 09-994. No. 09-1012. Philip Morris USA Inc., fka Philip Morris, Inc., Petitioner v. United States, et al. R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company, et al., Petitioners v. United States, et al. United States, Petitioner v. Philip Morris USA Inc., fka Philip Morris, Inc., et al. Altria Group, Inc., Petitioner v. United States, et al. British American Tobacco (Investments) Limited, Petitioner v. United States, et al. Tobacco-Free Kids Action Fund, et al., Petitioners v. Philip Morris USA Inc., fka Philip Morris, Inc., et al. Lorillard Tobacco Company, Petitioner v. United States, et al. 561 U.S. 1025, 130 S. Ct. 3501, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 5350.

177 L. Ed. 2d 1090,

June 28, 2010.

Petitions for writs of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.

Same cases below, 386 U.S. App. D.C. 49, 566 F.3d 1095.
